derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French monogramme, from late Latin monogramma, from Greek

entry.tran: (由姓名首字母组成、标于自己的衣物等上的)交织字母，花押字
entry.def: A monogram is a design based on the first letters of a person's names, which is put on things they own, such as their clothes.

means.word_mean: 1. a graphic symbol consisting of 2 or more letters combined (usually your initials); printed on stationery or embroidered on clothing
